data.title: Miramax Home Page
data.text:
news

New 'Scary Movie' In The Works Under Jonathan Glickman's Miramax & Neal H. Moritz – CinemaCon

The Miramax label at Paramount under new boss Jonathan Glickman is getting back into the Scary Movie business with a new movie that will go into production this year for theatrical release in 2025. This …

news

'The Holdovers' receives five Academy Award nominations, including Best Picture, Best Actor, Best Supporting Actress, Best Original Screenplay and Best Film Editing

'The Holdovers' receives five Academy Award nominations, including Best Picture, Best Actor (Paul Giamatti), Best Supporting Actress (Da'Vine Joy Randolph), Best original Screenplay (David Hemingson) and Best Film Editing (Kevin Tent)

Read More >

news

'The Holdovers' receives seven BAFTA nominations

'The Holdovers' receives seven BAFTA nominations including Best Film, Best Director, Best Leading Actor and Best Supporting Actress.

Read More >

news

Paul Giamatti takes home the award for best actor in a motion picture, musical or comedy for 'The Holdovers' at the 2024 Golden Globes

Paul Giamatti took home the award for best actor in a motion picture, musical or comedy, at the 2024 Golden Globe Awards on Sunday. Kristen Wiig and Will Ferrell presented the actor with the award …

Read More >

news

Da’Vine Joy Randolph Wins For ‘The Holdovers’ At The Golden Globes In The Best Supporting Actress In A Motion Picture – Drama

The Golden Globes shook up the supporting actress race by awarding Da’Vine Joy Randolph the prize for her scene-stealing work in The Holdovers. Randolph has quickly become the actress to watch after her vulnerable and …

Read More >

news

The Holdovers is nominated for Golden Globes for Best Picture, Best Performance by an Actor for Paul Giamatti, and Best Performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role for Da’Vine Joy Randolph

On the Best Motion Picture – Musical-Comedy front, Barbie and Poor Things are joined by Amazon MGM Studios’ Air, Orion/Amazon MGM’s American Fiction, Focus Features’ The Holdovers and Netflix’s May December.

Read More >

news

The Holdovers is an AFI Award Winner for one of the Best Pictures of the Year

AFI Awards Film Top 10: 'The Holdovers', ‘Barbie’, ‘Oppenheimer’, ‘Maestro’, ‘Killers Of The Flower Moon’ Among Org’s Best Of 2023

news

The Holdovers picks up four nominations at the Independent Spirit Award

“The Holdovers,” a critically acclaimed coming-of-age story, was nominated for four awards, but didn’t get a best feature nod.

news

Pete Davidson Horror Film ‘The Home’ Goes To Lionsgate In U.S. Deal; Miramax Debuted ‘The Purge’ Helmer James DeMonaco’s Pic At TIFF

Lionsgate has closed a U.S. deal for The Home, the James DeMonaco-directed thriller that stars Pete Davidson. The film was made by Miramax, and it screened for buyers outside competition at the 2023 Toronto Film …
